lyrics:
28 contributorslittle sister lyricsverse 1
hey sister why you all alone
im standin out your window
hey little sister can i come inside dear
i wanna show you all my love
i wanna be the only one
i know you like nobody ever baby

chorus
little sister cant you find another way
no more livin life behind a shadow
little sister cant you find another way
no more livin life behind a shadow

verse 2
you whisper secrets in my ear
slowly dancin cheek to cheek
such a sweet thing when you open up baby
they say ill only do you wrong
but come together cause i understand
just who you really are yeah baby

chorus
little sister cant you find another way
no more livin life behind a shadow
little sister cant you find another way
no more livin life behind a shadow
come check it out
see queens of the stone age liveget tickets as low as 51you might also likeguitar solo13embed
